headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://vercel.live https://fonts.googleapis.com; script-src-elem 'self' https://vercel.live https://fonts.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; connect-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data:;
